subject.description: A glamorous western woman with long, voluminous, straight black hair
subject.pose: Elegant crouching or squatting pose, one hand gracefully touching the chin, looking directly at the camera with a neutral, sophisticated expression
subject.features: Fair skin, winged eyeliner, soft pink matte lipstick, defined facial structure

fashion_and_apparel.outerwear: Oversized, structured electric pink wool trench coat or blazer draped over the shoulders
fashion_and_apparel.inner_wear: White satin or silk bodysuit with a scoop neckline and sheer corset detailing at the waist

composition_and_setting.background: Minimalist, solid light pink or off-white studio backdrop
composition_and_setting.perspective: Eye-level or slightly low angle to emphasize the pose and silhouette

lighting_and_aesthetic.lighting: Spotlight effect creating a circular halo on the background behind the head; soft directional key light from the front-top to create subtle shadows and highlight fabric textures
lighting_and_aesthetic.color_palette: Monochromatic black and grey with warm accents from hair and skin tones

technical_details.camera_feel: Shot on 85mm lens, sharp focus on subject, soft fall-off on background, high resolution, clean studio photography
